name: That traveling guy - test 1 - world
description:
My first part of my game that can be tested (and also the shader that I wrote)

This test is about most of the terrain and some basic movement

If you've found a bug or something that wasn't supposed to happen then please leave a comment

*The devlog about this test version is out on youtube (see my devlog playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEN0z45X0Yw9leG_HuM65WyXHnpQLxsCW or the trailer/gameplay video)
